Author: HannahAching
Text: > I’ve been thinking lately and think I’m dysphoric about my hair, is that  even a thing? I’ve never been happy with anything about myself, I’m  constantly changing and never satisfied.   I can relate to this. I went from a hair length below the butt, to buzzing it all off to 2cm. I figured that if I'm going to hate my looks anyway on the bad days, at least now I'm hating something that doesn't require a lot of effort.   &#x200B;  I'm sorry I don't have anything useful to say about the main part of your post. It was just this last thing that resonated with me.
